project_abstract.cdata: The Third Highway Project consists of: (a) pavement strengthening of 204 km of primary roads; (b) procurement of equipment for highway maintenance and for a soils laboratory and DSP; (c) technical assistance to MPWUT for: (i) transport planning in DSP, (ii) scholarships for training of local DSP personnel, and (iii) advisory services for promotion of the domestic construction industry; (d) consulting services for: (i) construction supervision under item (a) above; (ii) preinvestment studies for improvement of the Louga-Dahra road (80 km), and for pavement strengthening of about 180 km of primary roads; and (iii) road maintenance begun under the Second Highway Project.
